Urgent position of Senior Business Systems Analyst - Supply Chain Management
Location - Fremont, CA (3 Day Onsite)
Job Requirement:
Business Systems Analyst (BSA) with strong experience in Source to Settle processes in ECC and S4 environment and associated tools for successful implementation of a Business/Digital Transformation Project.
Job Responsibilities:
• Solid hands-on experience in Source to Settle (S2S) processes, e.g., Material Requirement Planning, RFQ, forecasting, PO Management, Consignment, Sub-contracting and Supplier Collaboration, Capacity planning and Constraints, Inbound logistics, Costing and Supplier invoicing
• Strong experience in S4 Supply Chain Execution capabilities and SAP ECC MM/PP and RICEFWs with cross functional workstream impact analysis
• Solid hands-on experience in end to end Procure to Pay processes, e.g., master data, RFQ, forecasting, source determination, MRP, Inventory strategies (safety stock, consignment, replenishment, rebalancing, etc.), Sub-contracting, Purchase order (PO) management
• Ability to connect multiple operations domains (Planning, Fulfillment, Manufacturing, Logistics, Spares Operations) and their interdependencies with Procurement
• Partners closely with business partners, systems analysts, development, architecture and project teams to facilitate optimal solution design and delivery
• Translate the business requirements to functional specifications document, develop and own requirements traceability matrix
• Assist the Solution/Technical Architects in identifying and managing functionality and Application issues, risks, and scope creep
• Experience with both waterfall and agile project management methodologies, and ability to deliver on responsibilities during various project phases including:
  o Requirements (Validation and Alignment)
  o Design (Blueprint and Spec)
  o Develop (Technical Spec, Prototyping, Configuration, and Unit testing)
  o Test (Integration testing and User acceptance testing)
  o Training/Documentation
  o Deploy (Cutover, Go Live)
  o Run (Post-mortem, Hypercare)
• Able to manage multiple projects with competing priorities.
• Provide end user support during hyper care
• Must be able to demonstrate the skills and ability to build effective and productive relationships within and outside the immediate team and developers
Minimum Qualifications:
• 10+ years overall SAP experience with 5+ years of experience in ECC & S/4 (MM, PP)
• Demonstrated expertise across multiple enterprise systems include SAP and No code platforms
